0.0.1.name: wordpress/oembedder
0.0.1.description:
This plugin provides support for using oEmbed in your Wordpress blog.

Rick media Example: [oembed:http://polldaddy.com/oembed?url=http://answers.polldaddy.com/poll/2431815/&format=xml] This will put the selected polldady poll on your blog

Photo example Flickr: [oembed:http://www.flickr.com/services/oembed/?url=http://www.flickr.com/photos/23886028@N04/3983995799/in/set-72157622398187791/] This will put a Flickr photo into your posting.

Video example Youtube: [oembed:http://www.youtube.com/oembed?url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yvdbqcbRH50&format=json]
